item.title: Git: Removing Untracked Files
item.description: git clean -fdx -f - force -d - include directories -x - include ignored files !Use with Caution! This command will delete files that you haven’t thought of. Be careful whenever running a command with -f
item.content:
git clean -fdx

-f - force

-d - include directories

-x - include ignored files

!Use with Caution!

This command will delete files that you haven’t thought of. Be careful whenever running a command with -f
